name: Bicep
summary: Strengthen and define your upper arms with focused bicep exercises.
details: This workout improves arm strength, boosts muscle endurance, and enhances pulling power. Suitable for beginners to advanced users. Perform using dumbbells, cables, or resistance bands for best results.
information: Improves arm strength, muscle endurance, and pulling power.
Appropriate for beginners through advanced athletes.
Uses dumbbells, cables, or resistance bands.

name: Body-Back
summary: Shift stubborn body fat and build lean muscle with this total-body back workout.
details: Ideal for developing posture, spinal support, and overall strength. Includes exercises like pull-downs, rows, and hyperextensions. Great for both fat loss and balanced muscle symmetry.
information: Improves posture, spinal support, and overall strength.
Incorporates pull-downs, rows, and hyperextensions.
Supports fat loss and balanced muscle symmetry.

name: Body-Butt
summary: Focused glute and lower-body workout to tone and lift.
details: Strengthens hips, thighs, and improves balance and stability. Perfect for sculpting curves and supporting posture. Includes squats, hip thrusts, and lunges.
information: Targets glutes, hips, and thighs for enhanced strength.
Improves balance, stability, and posture.
Features squats, hip thrusts, and lunges.

name: Legs & Core
summary: A compound workout for stronger legs and a stable core.
details: Boosts endurance, coordination, and muscle balance. Combines lunges, squats, planks, and leg raises. Ideal for athletes and general fitness goals.
information: Builds lower-body strength and core stability.
Enhances endurance, coordination, and balance.
Includes lunges, squats, planks, and leg raises.

name: Pectoral Machine
summary: Build and tone your chest muscles using controlled resistance.
details: Helps define pecs, shoulders, and triceps while improving posture. A safe and effective machine-based exercise for all fitness levels. Combine with push-ups or chest fly for variation.
information: Defines chest, shoulders, and triceps.
Supports better posture with guided resistance.
Pairs well with push-ups and chest fly variations.

name: Weight Bench
summary: A versatile workout for chest, triceps, shoulders, and back.
details: Incorporates bench presses, dumbbell fly, and incline variations. Builds functional strength and muscle endurance. Perfect for full-body toning and core stability.
information: Covers chest, triceps, shoulders, and back training.
Uses presses, dumbbell fly, and incline variations.
Improves full-body toning and core stability.

name: Weight Loss
summary: A dynamic mix of cardio, HIIT, and light resistance exercises to accelerate fat burning.
details: Enhances metabolism, stamina, and energy levels. Works well with diet control and hydration tracking. Great for anyone looking to drop fat and stay fit.
information: Combines cardio, HIIT, and light resistance work.
Boosts metabolism, stamina, and energy.
Pairs effectively with diet control and hydration tracking.

name: Woman Up Front
summary: Designed specifically for women focusing on full-body toning and confidence.
details: Includes functional training, glute work, and light resistance moves. Improves strength, flexibility, and balance. Can be customized for all fitness levels.
information: Targets full-body toning with a focus on confidence.
Blends functional training, glute work, and light resistance.
Adaptable for every fitness level while improving strength and balance.
